cast.overview: A struggling salesman takes custody of his son as he's poised to begin a life-changing professional career.
cast.title: The Pursuit of Happyness

details.biography: John Robb is an American actor primarily known for his supporting roles in film and television. In 1999, he appeared in the thriller 8mm, playing the role of a porn vendor. In addition to this production, he also appeared in films such as The Pursuit of Happyness (2006) as a homeless man and The Californians (2005) as a city council speaker.
details.name: John Robb
